document_name: Presentation of the first “Clever Living” part of the package “Green relaunch for Luxembourg - a plus for the climate, skills and citizens”
document_description: The Luxembourguese government released on May 27th a COVID-19-related stimulus plan called "Gréng Relance – E plus fir d’Klima, d’Handwierk an d’Bierger". This plan notably aims at incentivising energy efficiency in buildings, the use of renewable energy sources, and "soft mobility" modes.
